<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="OLD Technical Services">3a6c66681b0c01905b1b411acd4bcb88</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:a123fdcd1b80c1905b1b411acd4bcb48</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Software - onChange</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }

    if (newValue == 'lidia') {
        g_form.setVisible('prerequisit_version', true);
        g_form.setMandatory('prerequisit_version', true);
		
		g_form.setMandatory('filter_resset_date', false);
        g_form.setMandatory('filter_activity', false);
        g_form.setMandatory('engine_model', false);
        g_form.setMandatory('engine_serial_number', false);
		g_form.setVisible('filter_resset_date', false);
        g_form.setVisible('filter_activity', false);
        g_form.setVisible('engine_model', false);
        g_form.setVisible('engine_serial_number', false);
    }
    if (newValue == 'dpf') {
        g_form.setVisible('filter_resset_date', true);
        g_form.setVisible('filter_activity', true);
        g_form.setVisible('engine_model', true);
        g_form.setVisible('engine_serial_number', true);
		g_form.setVisible('prerequisit_version', true);
        g_form.setMandatory('filter_resset_date', true);
        g_form.setMandatory('filter_activity', true);
        g_form.setMandatory('engine_model', true);
        g_form.setMandatory('engine_serial_number', true);
		g_form.setMandatory('prerequisit_version', true);
        
    }
    if (newValue == 'sculi') {
        g_form.setMandatory('filter_resset_date', false);
        g_form.setMandatory('filter_activity', false);
        g_form.setMandatory('engine_model', false);
        g_form.setMandatory('engine_serial_number', false);
        g_form.setMandatory('prerequisit_version', false);
        g_form.setVisible('filter_resset_date', false);
        g_form.setVisible('filter_activity', false);
        g_form.setVisible('engine_model', false);
        g_form.setVisible('engine_serial_number', false);
        g_form.setVisible('prerequisit_version', false);
    }



}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>anis.bekdash@doitwise.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-25 16:25:39</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>38c2c5e51b4c45905b1b411acd4bcb99</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Software - onChange</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Support case" source="x_liisa_support_ca">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Support case">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_38c2c5e51b4c45905b1b411acd4bcb99</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>anis.bekdash@doitwise.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-12-06 15:29:55</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
